index.title: Adopt your own pet monster and join the Moshi fun!
index.description: Moshi is a free online game where you can adopt your own pet Monster and go on amazing adventures together. Play games and puzzles to earn Rox, level up your Monster, and grow flowers in the garden to attract and collect ultra-rare Moshlings!
index.keywords: moshi, moshy, game, online, virtual world, friendly, free
index.logo.title: Welcome to Moshi!
